title: Spa Interior Design
description: An interior design project focusing on the detailing of a two-level spa. The design incorporates a vintage theme for the spa and a fun, animal-inspired theme for the children's area. The project emphasizes comfort, relaxation, and functionality with dedicated spaces for treatments, wellness, and family-friendly amenities.
features: Vintage-themed spa interiors with warm and calming ambiance
Dedicated reception and waiting area with inviting design
Pedicure and manicure space with specialized seating
Hair spa and haircut area designed for comfort
Massage rooms with integrated steam facilities
Retail store for essential oils and spa products
Children's saloon and play area with fun, animal-inspired theme
Separate eating, reading, and waiting lounge for families
Staff areas and washrooms on both floors for functionality
Zoning of services across two floors for optimized user flow
